channel.title: twiiter bootstrap on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in twiiter bootstrap on SpiderSoft

item.title: Twitter Bootstrap add ons and extensions
item.description:
My collection of Twitter Bootstrap addons is growin each day. As at today we have

  • Bootstrap From Builder – really usefool tool for building bootstrap forms. It works based on rag and drop interface,
  • Time Picker – a very cool widget to easily select a time for a text input using your mouse or arrow keys.,
  • Date Picker,
  • Font Awesome,
  • snippets for Bootstrap bootsnipp.com
  • golderBootstrap – phildionne.github.com/golden-bootstrap/#goldenBootstrap
  • BootStrap Notify – nijikokun.github.com/bootstrap-notify/
  • Pivot.js is a simple way to summarize large data sets on the fly,
